TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
SE: But you're not very fly.

SP: Be pretty fly.

You can just fly 1 sec and get killed by a housemaid. 

Have a grenade launcher
every time you launch a grenade, a random molecule in your body will randomly mutate. this means you might have no side effects or suddenly have seven tongues and three point seven toes.

Granted. 

I wish I can have a GAU-8

SE: You loose the plot.

SP: I can see straight through things.

SE: you can only see electronics inside your computer when you play ksp

SP: the ability to play ksp2 now

Side effect: The game isn't finished yet and is very buggy

Superpower: The ability to quick save and quick load in real life, that way I can undo any bad choices I want.

Side effect: You can only make the saves after you have made the choice

Superpower: I can make energy from sunlight.

SE: You are green and brown and rooted in place.

SP: I can turn toys into the real thing.

SE: they instantly grow to life size and you have to hold the to change them.

SP: I have the ability to summon my KSP craft to real life at any distance from me

Side effect: It has no resources in it, making it useless.

Superpower: I can use unicode characters on Windows' CMD

SE: You never know the result.

SP: I can duplicate perfectly , anything I see.

SE: Your a really ugly eagle and the spirits don't like you

SP: i can summon ketchup whoever's forehead I want.

SE: you also summon ketchup on your own forehead

SP: I can survive by breathing any gas

SE: The gas you breathe in comes out the other end at inconvenient times.

SP: I can put anyone to sleep

SE: You sleep first, so others stay unslept.

SP: A superpower of making cat doors into other universes.

SE: You always wake up to a cat sleeping on your chest.

SP: I can imagine anything.

SE: Everyone else can see exactly what you imagine.

SP: I can look at a computer and make it INFINITELY FAST!!!! (i know, im a nerd)

SE: It creates infinite heat, destroying the universe.

SP: The power of having every superpower!

se:keybind problem and having every key to trigger an overall,mixed effect

sp:to make every superpower not have side effects and work as desired if they dont create side effects,including this

SE: all effects of the superpower could be considered side effects henceforth making all your powers useless

 

SP: Infinite brain power

SE: It constantly give you a headache

SP: I can blow up any toilet I think about blowing up.

SE: whenever you go to the toilet the thought of that toilet exploding comes to your mind, exploding the toilet you are using.

SP: I have the force

SE: It doesn't work if you think abt using it

SP: I can Bbecome a lamp if i touch an electric plug

SE: You can't turn back

SP: I do not need to breathe
